34.ara-name: كتاب الرؤيا عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Bakrah narrated:"One day the Prophet (s.a.w) said: "'Who among you had a dream?' A man said: "I did. I saw as if a scale had descended from the Heavens in which you and Abu Bakr were weighed So you outweighed Abu Bakr. Abu Bkar and 'Umar were weighed, and Abu Bakr outweighed ('Umar). 'Umar and 'Uthman were weighed and 'Umar outweighed ('Uthman). Then the scale was raised up.' Then I saw dislike in the the face of Messenger of Allah (s.a.w)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي رُؤْيَا النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم الْمِيزَانَ وَالدَّلْوَ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Prophet(ﷺ) Dreaming About The Scale And The Bucket
